txt.en: You have been tasked with travelling to Trestlebridge in the North Downs and finding a potential visitor who might accept an invitation to visit Furtherholm for the Midsummer Festival. You should look around Trestlebridge for potential visitors.
People bothered ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Yes, I need a break from all this ruin and woe. I shall pack.'
'Don't be ridiculous. Be on your way.'
Khâtaphos believes that there may be some among the Men of Trestlebridge who could use a tropical holiday.
'Yes, I must leave this place lest I go mad.'
'Can't you see I have work here to do? Leave me be.'
'I don't think I could leave here fast enough!'
'I will not leave the others here to suffer alone.'
'There is much rebuilding to do, and I must help with it. Be on your way.'
Completed Gathering Guests: Trestlebridge
You see some potential visitors

'A guest who claims to be a Bree-lander has asked a favour of me. She tells me that north of Bree-town, there is a village called Trestlebridge that has seen many attacks from Orc hordes, and a good part of the town has been lost to fire. She is enjoying her stay and has asked me to extend an invitation to the people of Trestlebridge, who could certainly do with a relaxing holiday!

'Go to this Trestlebridge and find someone who might cheerfully accept an invitation to Zír Aktar. Mind that you do not bother too many people who would not be open to such a journey, or people will think you a pest and grow to have a poor opinion of us.'

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends.</rgb>
You have found potential visitors in Trestlebridge. You should choose one who is most likely to accept an invitation to visit Furtherholm for the Midsummer Festival and invite them.
